casebody.data:
QUEVEDO-WOOLF
v.
OVERHOLSER, et al. 361P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 5, 2018 James P. Hoffman, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Overholser, Merry Eileen.

William W. Cameron, Attorney at Law, Salisbury.

Jessica S. Bullock, Carolyn J. Woodruff, Attorneys at Law, Greensboro, for Quevedo-Woolf, Celina. Daniel Carter, for Carter, Daniel.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Plaintiff to Stay 6 November 2018 Trial Court Hearing:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th of November 2018."
